welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bacoor, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its historical landmarks, delicious food, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Bacoor has to offer.

restaurants.name: Gerry's Grill
restaurants.description: Gerry's Grill is a filipino restaurant located in Bacoor.
restaurants.address: 2nd Flr, SM City Bacoor (at Aguinaldo Hwy & Tirona Hwy), 4102 Bacoor City, Cavite

restaurants.name: Krispy Kreme
restaurants.description: Krispy Kreme is a donut shop located in Bacoor.
restaurants.address: Upper Ground Flr, SM City Bacoor (at Tirona Hwy & Aguinaldo Hwy), 4102 Bacoor City, Cavite

restaurants.name: Skillets & Grill
restaurants.description: Skillets & Grill is a filipino restaurant located in Las Piñas.
restaurants.address: BF Resort Drive, Las Piñas, Rizal

restaurants.name: Kainan Sa Balsa
restaurants.description: Kainan Sa Balsa is a filipino restaurant located in Bacoor.

restaurants.name: Makimoto Sushi Bar and Restaurant
restaurants.description: Makimoto Sushi Bar and Restaurant is a japanese restaurant located in Zapote.
restaurants.address: Gloria Diaz St. BF Resort Village, Las Piñas, Cavite

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves Philippine Airlines and its subsidiaries.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves only small domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
